original_title: Throbbing Gristle: Mission of Dead Souls - The Last Live Performance of TG
overview: Throbbing Gristle performing live at the Kezar Pavillion in San Francisco, California on the evening of May 29th, 1981. This would be TG's last show until reforming in 2002.
title: Throbbing Gristle: Mission of Dead Souls - The Last Live Performance of TG
